<q:component name="UploadDocument">
  <q:action name="uploadDoc" method="POST">
    <q:param name="document" type="file" required="true" maxsize="5MB" accept="application/pdf" />
    
    <q:file action="upload"
            file="{document}"
            destination="./uploads/documents/"
            nameConflict="makeUnique"
            result="uploadResult" />
    
    <q:redirect url="/documents" flash="Document {uploadResult.filename} uploaded!" />
  </q:action>
</q:component>

expected_behavior: Validates file size (max 5MB) and type (PDF only) before upload
